DOC.brief_summary: Does group culture using micro-well group culture dishes improve human blastocyst development compared to single embryo culture?
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Single vs Group Embryo Culture in Micro-well Group Culture Dish
DOC.criteria: female age uner 40, male age under 60 patients undergoing IVFtreatment with oocyte collection after ovarian hyperstimulation having signed the studyspecific consent form patient fulfilling clinic's standard criteria for blastocyst culture minimum 5 normally fertilized oocytes at the time of fertilization check use of any type of surgically retrieved sperm cells patients undergoing any kind of genetic diagnosis at any developmental stage
